title: Dry State for the Poor Only
selftext:
How did they get the beer in Gujarat?

https://preview.redd.it/slfpln9oof1c1.jpg?width=640&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=71b6eea65fd413c4446526674b3055c7d7f50684
comments: Five star hotels catering to tourists are allowed to sell booze with some conditions attached.

Even as a Gujarati you can get beer/other alcohol, in limited quantities. You need to get a permit made. As a tourist, it's the same, there are quite a few Liquor stores in Ahmedabad. And you can apply for the permit online.
Do reddit a favor? Delete your account and never come back in here again.

Something that the Gujjus really share with 
Pakistan. No wonder they often ask the detractors to go tonPakistan.
